title: As Ukraine offensive gains momentum, Russia's 49th Army called 'highly vulnerable': Live updates
content:
1. As Ukraine offensive gains momentum, Russia's 49th Army called 'highly vulnerable': Live updates  USA TODAY
  2. Ukraine’s counter-offensive in Kherson 'gathering momentum'; UK advisor warns of nuclear risk  CNBC
  3. Ukraine bids to retake Kherson from Russia, Western military sources say - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Ukraine steps up drive to retake Russian-controlled south with air strikes  Yahoo News
  5. Ukraine's counter-offensive gathering momentum, says UK intelligence  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ウクライナ攻勢が勢いを増す中、ロシア第49軍に「非常に脆弱」との声が。最新情報
随着乌克兰攻势的增强，俄罗斯的第49军被称为 "高度脆弱"。实时更新
